Text.Page:
What we need are echelon trophies. Unfortunately, you'll need to spread out across the world to find them.

Try these spots:

Balder's Temple (Normal)—{@linkcreature:425#8005#Auricadis}
Balder’s Temple (1 person)—{@linkcreature:825#6000#Nightmare Glaciernus}
Argon Core—{@linkcreature:426#20000#Meldita}
Manaya's Core—{@linkcreature:727#2007#Shandra Manaya}

Oh good—this token will help us become the richest power this world has ever seen!

Thank you!
